hero.title: Wholesome living made for the goodest lives
hero.subtitle: Professional dog boarding and pet care services with personalized attention. Your beloved companion deserves nothing but the best.

sections.title: Why Choose The Good Stay?
sections.subtitle: I understand that your dog isn't just a pet – they're family. That's why I provide the kind of personalized, loving care that gives you peace of mind and keeps your companion happy and healthy.

features.title: Personalized Care Plans
features.description: Every dog is unique. I create customized care plans based on your dog's personality, needs, and preferences.

features.title: Home Environment
features.description: No cages or kennels. Your dog stays in our home, sleeping on comfortable beds and enjoying a family atmosphere.

features.title: Daily Updates
features.description: Receive photos and updates throughout the day when requested so you always know how your companion is doing.

features.title: Complimentary Assessment
features.description: Every new client starts with a meet-and-greet to ensure I am the perfect match for your dog.

sections.title: My Promise to You
sections.content: At The Good Stay, I believe every dog deserves to be treated like family. I'm not just a boarding service, I'm a person who genuinely love dogs and understand the trust you place in me when you leave your companion in my care.

testimonials.quote: Our beagle, Toby, can be a handful, but Yee Sin handled him like a pro. She didn’t just walk him, she helped reinforce good habits and kept him happy and engaged. The daily photo updates made us feel connected even when we were away.
testimonials.author: Amanda Wong

testimonials.quote: Finding someone who truly understands senior dogs is rare, but Yee Sin exceeded every expectation with our golden retriever, Daisy. She managed Daisy’s medication perfectly and gave her so much love and care. We came home to the happiest senior pup ever.
testimonials.author: Daniel & Priya
